selected_skills.name: extract_angle_from_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the angle ∠CDE from the provided diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the diagram image to extract the angle ∠CDE.

selected_skills.name: map_angle_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the extracted angle to one of the provided multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the extracted angle and the multiple-choice options to determine the correct option.
